title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-4.9 - Requirements and procedures for professional authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-4.9 - Requirements and procedures for professional authorization

State Regulations

To qualify for authorization as a polysomnographic
technologist, an applicant shall be at least 18 years of age, file an
application together with the applicable fees with the department, and meet the
education, experience, examination and moral character requirements set forth
in sections
79-4.10, 79- 4.11, 79-4.12, and
79-4.13 of this Subpart, respectively. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-4.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
